name: ProjectL
description:
This game was for the Game-Off-200 jam, the limitation was "clishé", here are the clichés used in this game:

1-The more things change, the more you stay the same: in this game, the more things you change ( breaking doors and killing enemies on purpose) the more you loose the new powers that you got untill you comeback to your same initial powerless state.

2-Princess saving cliché: this cliché has been in games since supermario bros, saving the princess from the final boss.

3-player can't swim cliché: the player will die when he falls into the water.

4-All's fair in love and war: you would do anything and fight dirty to rescue your beloved kidnapped girl.

5-Get back up on the horse: you get back on your feet and go fight the spider who kidnapped your girl.

How to play:

1- you will have to collect the diamonds to gain powers.

2-diamonds have to be collected in the shown order, skyblue first then the blue then the green, red, yellow, and finally purple.

3-if you kill an enemy or kick a door before collection all the diamonds, you will loose one diamonds.

             This is an open world "small world XD" metroidvania, but it has alot of small hidden things to discover as well, and multiple ways to finish it.

enjoy <3
